analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the test, indicating that there might be significant issues affecting its performance. It is recommended to investigate this page further to identify and resolve the problems.
insights: The Time To First Byte (TTFB) metric is relatively low across all pages, indicating that the server response time is fast. This is a positive sign for web performance.

The First Contentful Paint (FCP) metric, which measures when the first piece of content is rendered on the page, is also within an acceptable range for all pages. This indicates that the pages are visually loading quickly for users.

Despite having the longest load time, the homepage still loads within 1 second, which is considered a good user experience. However, optimizing its load time can still provide additional performance benefits.
